generated_body: The article titled "Highway blockade reveals splits in Hong Kong protest movement" is likely to explore the current state of the protest movement in Hong Kong, focusing on the recent highway blockade as a pivotal event. Readers can expect an analysis of how this action reflects divisions within the movement, possibly highlighting varying perspectives among protestors regarding tactics and goals. The piece may also discuss the implications of these splits for the future of the protests and how they may affect public support and government response.
